articles.author: Caitlin Danaher
articles.title: NATO chief says Europe should ‘keep on dreaming’ if it thinks it can defend itself without the US - CNN
articles.description: NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte has told Europe it should “keep on dreaming” if it thinks it can defend itself without the support of the United States.
articles.content:
NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte has told Europe it should keep on dreaming if it thinks it can defend itself without the support of the United States.
If anyone thinks here again that the European… [+2563 chars]
